item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
# Converge v1.0
## First Public Release
Converge is a native Pomodoro app for macOS, focused on productivity and simplicity.
## Key Features
### Pomodoro Timer - Configurable work and break cycles - Automatic or manual mode - Support for short and long breaks - Visual progress indicator
### Statistics and History - Track your productivity with daily, weekly, and monthly counters - Complete history of all completed sessions - Progress and trends visualization
### Interface and Experience - macOS menu bar integration - timer always visible - Desktop widget - track the timer without opening the app - Theme support: light, dark, or follow system appearance - Modern and intuitive interface built with SwiftUI
### Notifications - Alerts and sounds at the end of each phase - Customizable notification settings - Integration with macOS notification system
### Automatic Updates - Automatic update system using Sparkle - Daily update checks - Notifications when new versions are available
## Requirements
- macOS 11.0 or higher
## Installation
1. Download the DMG file from the [releases page](https://github.com/rckbrcls/converge/releases) 2. Open the downloaded DMG file 3. Drag the Converge app to the Applications folder 4. Run the app for the first time
**Note**: If the app shows security warnings, right-click on the app and select "Open".
## What's Next
This is just the beginning! We're working on continuous improvements and new features. Your feedback is very important to us.
## Thank You
Thank you for using Converge! We hope it helps you stay focused and increase your productivity.
